WhoAmI.TITLE: Who am I?
WhoAmI.SHORT_PRESENTATION: I am a Software Engineer, strongly passionate about technology and innovation!
WhoAmI.CURRENT_SITUATION: Currently occupied as a Full-Stack Web Engineer, I make use of the latest Frontend & Backend technologies to design and build efficient web applications.
WhoAmI.FUTURE_GOALS: I am always looking for new challenges and opportunities to grow and improve my skills. For the future I am specializing in lower-level software engineering, with particular focus on the Rust programming language.
